item.title: Abstraction and optimization
item.author: pgregory@pgregory.net (Gregory Petrosyan)
item.description:
Abstraction and optimization

The root of all evil is either premature optimization or premature abstraction (which is a form of premature optimization).

item.title: Technical debt
item.author: pgregory@pgregory.net (Gregory Petrosyan)
item.description:
Technical debt

Technical debt is an amortized loan of productivity.
